name: Why a Daughter Needs a Dad: Celebrate Your Father Daughter Bond this Father's Day with this Special Picture Book! (Always in My Heart)
author: Gregory E. Lang
summary: This new picture book for kids ages 3-7 and beyond is a touching story showing all the ways a father will help his daughter grow. This is the gift for every girl dad and little girl to celebrate their special bond! Featuring charming animal illustrations and heartwarming rhymes about the moments fathers and daughters share, Why a Daughter Needs a Dad is the perfect story to connect father and child together.
